title: Chewy Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Line baking sheets with parchment.
Whisk flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Cream butter with brown and granulated sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then vanilla.
Mix in dry ingredients until just combined. Fold in chocolate chips.
Scoop 2 tbsp mounds onto sheets. Bake 9-11 minutes until edges are golden and centers just set.
Cool on sheet 5 minutes, then transfer to rack.
notes: Chill dough 30 minutes for thicker cookies.
